lead_paragraph: Germany's Bundesliga and Major League Soccer (MLS) in the United States are among the competitions which will be used to test video replays in soccer, the sport's rule-making body IFAB said on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Bundesliga, MLS Among Competitions to Test Video Replays
headline.main: Bundesliga, MLS Among Competitions to Test Video Replays

snippet: Germany's Bundesliga and Major League Soccer (MLS) in the United States are among the competitions which will be used to test video replays in soccer, the sport's rule-making body IFAB said on Thursday....
